List Manager Documentation

Chris Kolar has made available list manager documentation for Mailman. This documentation has not been updated for 2.1 and thus is missing some of the admin options available in Mailman 2.1.

The GNU Mailman - List administrator's Manual by Terri Oda is available, but not yet complete. This is also available in PDF format (approx. 84k), PS format (approx. 121k), and plain text format (approx. 65k).
